text: I recently joined a tennis class at Deuce tennis, and it exceeded all my expectations! The atmosphere was welcoming, and the coach created a perfect balance between instruction, practice, and fun. Each session focused on different skills like serving, volleys, and game strategy which kept things fresh and engaging. My confidence and technique have noticeably improved since starting this class. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to learn or level up their game in a supportive environment.

After 5 classes with coach Justin, my forehand and backhand improved significantly! Thank you to Deuce tennis for helping out my game and I highly recommend those who wants to kick start their tennis journey with Deuce tennis be it beginner to advance levels

I recently joined this tennis class, and I couldn’t be happier with my experience! The coach is incredibly experienced, understanding, and motivating, making the lessons both fun and productive. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, the structured training sessions cater to all levels!
Looking forward to more sessions with the team soon!!
Enjoyed the tennis lessons ! :) Super fun & my game has improved. The coach’s personalized tips and encouraging approach made learning both effective and enjoyable :)
One of the best tennis classes out there in Singapore, felt a significant improvement just after 4 private sessions! Thank you Deuce Tennis for providing a solid tennis program !
